radiographic_examinations.findings: An irregular mass (3.5 cm by 3.7 cm by 5.0 cm) in the anterior right upper lobe, multiple pleural nodules (most <1 cm), mediastinal and right hilar lymphadenopathy (nodes â‰¤12 mm).

radiographic_examinations.date: Three months after starting erlotinib therapy
radiographic_examinations.findings: Decrease in size of pulmonary nodules and up to eight new mixed lytic and sclerotic vertebral lesions.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Reportedly revealed a decrease in size and number of pulmonary nodules.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Enlargement of the dominant mass in the right upper lobe and a new pleural effusion.
Enlargement of the dominant mass in the right upper lobe and right pleural effusion, new lung nodules.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest and abdomen
radiographic_examinations.findings: New mediastinal lymphadenopathy and a new heterogeneously enhancing liver metastasis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Findings consistent with progression of diffuse osseous metastatic disease.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple enhancing lesions in the thoracic vertebrae, consistent with osseous metastatic disease.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Findings consistent with progression of diffuse osseous metastatic disease.
